text: Bona bayilabo abangakholwa futhi abanivimbelayo eMasjid al-Haraam bavimbela umnikelo ukuthi ufike endaweni yabo, futhi ukube kwakungesingenxa yamadoda akholwayo nabesifazane abakholwayo enaningabazi eningase nibanyathele obekuzonehlela ngabo ukusolwa ngaphandle kolwazi, ukuze uMvelinqangi angenise emseni wakhe lowo amthandayo, ukube babehlukene ngempela sasizobajezisa labo abangakholwanga phakathi kwabo ngesijeziso esibuhlungu
